bug.author: abhishek021
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 Describe the bug I'm getting NoSuchMethodError: com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState(ZLjava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/Object;)V while trying to read data from underfs GCS through alluxio. To Reproduce Launch spark-shell with packages org.alluxio:alluxio-core-client-fs:2.0.0 and org.alluxio:alluxio-core-client-hdfs:2.0.0 and try reading through GCS underfs

comments.comment: I think there is no need of using packages o while launching spark-submit. All I needed was to make sure that every jvm process has the alluxio client jar. Thanks to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Gene>@Gene</denchmark-link> for helping me over slack.
